extension.name: Select Menu
extension.author: Rene Kreijveld
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3 or later
extension.description: Menu module to generate a menu as a select list.

field.name: menutype
field.label: Select Menu
field.description: Select a menu from the list

field.name: startLevel
field.label: Start Level
field.description: Level to start rendering the menu at. Setting the start and end levels to the same # and setting 'Show Sub-menu items' to yes will only display that single level.

field.name: endLevel
field.label: End Level
field.description: Level to stop rendering the menu at. If you choose 'All', all levels will be shown depending on 'Show Sub-menu items' setting.

field.name: showLabel
field.label: Show label
field.description: Show label left to the select list.

field.name: selectLabel
field.label: Select label
field.description: Label to show left of the select list.

field.name: topText
field.label: Top text
field.description: Text to show at the top of the select list.

field.name: class_sfx
field.label: Menu Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the menu items.

field.name: layout
field.label: Alternative Layout
field.description: Use a different layout from the supplied module or overrides in the templates.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the module. This allows for individual module styling.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select wether to cache the contents of this module.

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached.
